newsitem.title: UK: CRICKET-CROFT FINED AND WARNED AFTER ON-PITCH ROW.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-CROFT FINED AND WARNED AFTER ON-PITCH ROW.

text.p: Glamorgan on Thursday fined off-spinner Robert Croft 1,000 pounds ($1,580) and warned him about his future conduct following his televised pushing match with Essex's Mark Ilott.
The two players were involved in an animated argument after Ilott appealed against the light during the teams' NatWest Trophy semifinal at Chelmsford on Tuesday. Essex went on to win by one wicket.
The two players subsequently shook hands and have apologised for their behaviour.

Glamorgan issued a statement on Thursday saying: "The decision has been communicated to the English Cricket Board and it is the club's expectation that the matter may now be considered closed." $ = 0.630 British Pounds)
